@NonNullByDefault

Package com.hlag.oversigt.core.eventsource

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventSource.NOP
    Empty Module to provide an empty Guice configuration if the event source does not need custom configuration

    Scheduled EventSource - produces events with specified time period.

    Scheduled EventSource - produces events with specified time period.

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EventSourceException
    Excetion used to abort event source excecution due to some error.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    DataItemDefault
    Provide default values for data item entries of a widget
    EventId
    Binds event ID to field this annotation specified on
    EventSource
    Marks class as event source
    Property
    Marks properties if event sources and determines how they should be handled
